column2: "It's okay, it's okay... You are not afraid, you are not afraid."
"This body, this life, what was once lost. It's for the people... for everyone."
"Therefore... Do not be afraid, Harriet. It's alright, it will be okay..."
"Please excuse me! You saw something embarrassing... isn't that right?"
"Yes... I would be lying if I said I wasn't scared."
"Because each battle is frightening, I must end this quickly."
"I must never forget this feeling... So that I will not be too quick to go to war unless it's absolutely necessary."
"Umm, I don't want people to be unsettled that I was scared. So if you could keep it an absolute secret from everyone...."
